item.title: Trump's 'cardiac age' is 14 years younger. What does that mean?
item.description: The President's "cardiac age" has been reported to be 14 years younger than his chronological age. What does this mean, and who can get this test?

item.title: Antidepressant side effects differ depending on the drug, study finds
item.description: Researchers in the U.K. have published a major review of published data on physical side effects related to antidepressants such as changes in weight,...

item.title: Mental exercise can reverse a brain change linked to aging, study finds
item.description: Scientists have found the first compelling evidence that cognitive training can boost levels of a brain chemical that typically declines as people age...

item.title: 3 cases of new mpox strain reported in California
